attributes.action: Allow Year 11 students to have 1 month of study leave until exams in 2017
attributes.background: By the government not allowing us to have study leave students can not reach their full potential as some students are not able to work in a school environment. Study leave should be offered to everyone and students should also be allowed to access school resources if needed.

rejection.details: Granting study leave is the responsibility of individual schools. You could raise this issue with your school's governing body.
